name: Space Defender (4sandwiches)
description:
Emergency door opens not as fast as you would hope. But legions of bugs will not let you get bored. Hold these vicious hordes until you can go to safety but be careful - bodies will pile up until you’ll run out of places to go. Unless you’ll do something about it.

Disclaimer: The game made for Epic Game Jam  2021.

Controls:

  • Move: WSAD
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Fire: Left Mouse Button
  • Switch weapon: Right Mouse Button

There are some achievements in the game.
